section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion to announce in 74-1243, Beckwith against the United States, and for reasons stated in the opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Marshall filed an opinion concurring in the judgment.
Mr. Justice Brennan filed a dissenting opinion.
Mr. Justice Stevens took no part in either the consideration or the decision of the case.
